nodes.bodyText: Not really gain anything by having two tests. Combine two into one in order to run it quicker.
Move NODE_ENV and CI env variables to CircleCI config.yml.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,8 +13,8 @@
     "test-local:debug": "cross-env WORKBENCH_ENV=local PUPPETEER_HEADLESS=false DEBUG=true jest --maxWorkers=2",
     "test-staging": "cross-env WORKBENCH_ENV=staging jest --maxWorkers=3",
     "test-staging:debug": "cross-env WORKBENCH_ENV=staging PUPPETEER_HEADLESS=false DEBUG=true jest --maxWorkers=1",
-    "test:ci": "cross-env NODE_ENV=development CI=true jest --ci --maxWorkers=2",

nodes.bodyText: jest.config.js: const { defaults } = require('jest-config'); throws tslib error without this change.

Here ^.
Submit button click and verification were commented out due to captcha verification during initial implementation phase. Sometimes later, Neha added captchaSiteKey  so captcha verification always pass.
https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/docs/faq#id-like-to-run-automated-tests-with-recaptcha.-what-should-i-do
test was not disabled or skipped, only the final step (Submit) were commented out to avoid failure.
